definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: Biotic immune system is a highly complex system of distribution and self-adaptation.
sentences.chinese: 生物免疫系統是一個高度複雜的分佈協調自適應系統。

sentences.english: Still, these types of viruses can cause trouble for people with weakened immune systems.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這類病毒能給免疫系統弱的人們帶來麻煩。

sentences.english: The 67-year-old kidney transplant recipient has a weakened immune system.
sentences.chinese: 這位接受過腎臟移植手術的老人免疫系統非常弱。

sentences.english: Hayfever is caused by people's immune system reacting to pollen.
sentences.chinese: 人體的免疫系統對花粉做出反應，導致了花粉熱。

sentences.english: Multiple studies have shown a relationship between spirituality and the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 多項研究已表明在精神性和免疫系統之間的關係。

sentences.english: The toxins can be particularly harmful for people with weakened immune systems.
sentences.chinese: 而這些有毒物質對於免疫系統低下的人可能尤爲有害。

sentences.english: Defensins are peptidic components of the innate immune system of plants and animals.
sentences.chinese: 防禦素是動植物先天免疫系統的主要成分。

sentences.english: Better still, the pigs' immune systems are in free-fall.
sentences.chinese: 更讓病毒暢行無阻的是，豬的免疫系統一塌糊塗。

sentences.english: Interferons are produced by the immune system to fight infections and tumors.
sentences.chinese: 干擾素在免疫系統中是用來對抗感染和腫瘤的。

sentences.english: Another inappropriate response of the immune system is allergy.
sentences.chinese: 另一種免疫系統的不恰當反應是過敏。

sentences.english: A computer immune system model for host-based security scanning is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一個基於主機安全掃描的計算機免疫系統模型。

sentences.english: Some people will add a few drops of eucalyptus oil to their steam shower to give bolster the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 有些人還會在蒸氣浴里加幾滴桉樹油來強化免疫系統。

sentences.english: There is also evidence that UV radiation reduces the effectiveness of the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 還有證據表明，紫外線輻射可降低免疫系統的有效性。

sentences.english: The immune system is stronger, so it also helps in terms of physical health.
sentences.chinese: 免疫系統更強，所以對身體健康也有幫助。

sentences.english: It's a disease that destroyes immune system.
sentences.chinese: 是破壞人體免疫系統的疾病。

sentences.english: They are the police force that keeps the immune system from becoming trigger-happy.
sentences.chinese: 他們是警察部隊，抑制免疫系統的快樂扳擊。

definition: stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
